website_summaries.verdict: A strong dose of vitamin A for just 6 cents a pill.
pros: Each bottle contains 100 softgels with 10,000 IU of vitamin A in each dose
Helps with acne and other skin issues
cons: Does contain cod liver oil and soybean oil, so not ideal for vegetarians or those sensitive to soy

customer_reviews.title: Product that arrives is different than what's advertised.  Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This is the wrong product. The vitamin A shipped is not the vitamin A pictured. Contains retinyl palmitate. Manufacturer wont allow a return. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: LESSON PRO  LLC

customer_reviews.title: Please try it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered for years with acne and I wish someone would have told me about vitamin A a long time ago I have used it for a month and my acne has completely cleared up bring tears to my eyes with what this has done on my self esteem.
customer_reviews.author: Dylann Petersen

customer_reviews.title: My skin better than ever
customer_reviews.text: Cured my Acne! I've been taking it every morning for the last month and I was able to see my acne clearing up within 2 weeks. My skin better than ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ahrom Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for soft, smooth skin and health. Do not take if pregnant or consult doctor.
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin A is important for skin and eyes. Retinoids are formed from vitamin A derivatives and can contribute to reversing acne and promoting anti-aging. This vitamin A comes from retinyl palmitate, the mildest retinol, and beta-carotene. I have noticed softer and smoother skin. Note, vitamin A and its derivatives, even topically, are know tetragens. I do not recommend for any women pregnant or that could become pregnant. I think any person who could become pregnant to get their vitamin A from food sources. With any supplement, please check with your doctor before using. Other than pregnant women, I recommend this product for overall health and skin health.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Angele Matt

customer_reviews.title: Soybean causes me to breakout
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vitamin a brand thinking it would help my acne but it caused me to get little pimples around my face I believe it is because of the soy in it anyways I bought a solgar brand with no soy and it's better not saying this doesn't work just be careful with the soy
customer_reviews.author: Bye Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the item as pictured. The picture shows the supplement is only fish oil, but this bottle I received also has retinyl palmitate. How much of each? Who knows. If you are looking for pure retinol, this is no longer the proper choice. I hope the site will update the images of the product so others will not be misled as I was. I have ordered 2 other brands hoping to get at least one that has not been reformulated. I will update this review if possible when I get the new brands to report the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered during the COVID virus for immune system. I guess they are working. We are staying well.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Spect acular!
customer_reviews.text: I use because Vitamin A is good for the eyes...and I believe it does help because when I use on a consistent basis I don't see those little black spects.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: lied about ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The product was diffrent than described online. The nutrition label online said "vitamin A from fish liver oil". The product I recieved said "vitamin A from fish liver oil and RETINYL PALMITATE". Additionally, the packaging looked diffrent. Accurately portraying product ingredients is important.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Product
customer_reviews.text: Nature's Way Vitamin A caps are easy to swallow. I've used this company's products in the past and have always been satisfied with their quality.
customer_reviews.author: C C Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this with several other supplements to help with low back pain. I read an article about using vitamin k for low back pain and when I started researching it this is what I came up with- to use vitamins A, K, D3 and calcium. So I've been taking this combination at night for several months and it really has been helpful. I have arthritis in my back and SI joints so I have a lot of pain and I have definitely seen a difference. This particular pill is small and easy to swallow with no aftertaste
customer_reviews.author: KSA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Vit A is a great immune booster, so I recommend everyone keep them on hand.
customer_reviews.author: D Salmons

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: If your sensitive to Fish oil, coconut oil, etc.......these will make your face break out. I don't know if they work because I had to stop taking them .
customer_reviews.author: Meg S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I bought these soft gels. The swallowing of them is not a problem. Will purchase again..
customer_reviews.author: Owen Samuel

customer_reviews.title: I buy these habitually and in this brand. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these habitually and in this brand. The gel is small enough so that it doesn't bother me to swallow. No issues and frankly not one bit of acne since I learned that this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Kami Carranza

customer_reviews.title: good buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin have done a lot of difference in my hair. It has gotten thick and the scalp is harder.
customer_reviews.author: maddie

customer_reviews.title: Quality vitamin.
customer_reviews.text: Small Easy to take vitamins. Arrived in great condition. Will re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what to say. I actually ordered Vitamin E and got A. Maybe I messed up but heck with it. I will take it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Toms

customer_reviews.title: Honeycomb
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking these. The only reason I gave them 4 stars instead of 5,is because they came melted. I was trying to add a pic but it doesn’t let me. I was able to pull them a part but they were all stuck together like a honeycomb
customer_reviews.author: Yahaira More

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enchanted and good quality, it is as expected, I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Deby

customer_reviews.title: Retinyl palmitate is a synthetic form of vitamin A which ...
customer_reviews.text: Retinyl palmitate is a synthetic form of vitamin A which the picture of the label here on Amazon does not show! So the retinyl palmitate and codliver oil mixed. Not 100% natural:(
customer_reviews.author: Victor Vincent Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Way vitamins are very good, great for the
customer_reviews.text: Next to Nature Made, Nature's Way vitamins are very good, great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Elwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and great VA gel caps! Tiny and easy to swallow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great vitamins and well worth the money a good buy
customer_reviews.author: S. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: Still one of the best vitamin A supplements out there. 10k iu is great because some days I don't need so much, so 1 gel capsule is good enough. Other days, I need more and can just add on. This way, I don't have to worry about overdosing.
customer_reviews.author: Tintinsmate

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses the oil in the capsules to put on her face. I works well according to her.
customer_reviews.author: james a.

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sparks

customer_reviews.title: vet recommended for our dog
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products whose quality you just have to take on faith. Our vet recommended for our dog, who has skin problems, and the problems seem lessened since she started taking this.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Jo

customer_reviews.title: It's good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog and they are easy to give her because they are nice and small. I haven't tried them myself but works for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kymfused

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamins online
customer_reviews.text: This vitamins really do the job. They are just what you would expect from Nature's Way. Would gladly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Self preservation
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to preserve my eyesight. I had lasik 11 years ago and they said my eyesight would begin to worsen after a decade. F*CK that noise!!!! I bought these and take one everyday. My eyesight is no longer 20/20, but at least it's no longer deteriorating the way it was a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bye Felicia

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: they leak very bad and I don't use it at all. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Soybean Oil
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have read the reviews about the soy! Who wants to try to be "well" while eating GMO soybeans? Threw away and will re-order a better brand that does not use GMO's.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Knauff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im sort of confused, these are fish oil pills. I would have assumed A would be plant based?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gillman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT.
customer_reviews.text: I GOT THIS TO GET RID OF MY EYE FLOATERS. ALSO GAVE IT TO MY DAUGHTER FOR HER'S. THIS WORKS IN ABOUT A WEEK AND FLOATERS ARE GONE.
customer_reviews.author: ANNABELLA

customer_reviews.title: Not as depicted
customer_reviews.text: Bottle says it's fish oil. Actually product sent to me contained Retinal Palmitate. I was issued a refund. If you are not reading your labels, you might not be taking what you think you are.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin A from fish livers as nature intended.
customer_reviews.text: Nature's way is a great company. This form of vitamin A comes from fish livers. It's an excellent products at a very low price. A true nutritional bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Zardoz

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best vitamins A, I have taken. It's small and ease to swallow and I do feel better with my health.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Important defense for coronavirus
customer_reviews.text: I recently heard an infectious disease specialist who said Vitamin A is a great defense for the virus. Since I do not eat fish, this is the next best thing. I loathe large vitamins, but these are a swallow friendly size.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I keep purchasing this product due to the good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Emmons Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Have been using these for 6 months now due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for 6 months now due to deficiency and my hair is growing again. Need to buy some more
customer_reviews.author: John Gaspard

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: A good way to get vitamin a besides cod liver oil
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Just plain good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These work great, I can tell when I run out for some reason so I'm not taking them. I try to be a bottle ahead now so I don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Penny S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Never will buy this product they made it sound like you were getting two bottles ... so disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Mar & Al

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too high a dose when you consider your body stores Vitamin A...you could overdose if not careful
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Pat

customer_reviews.title: perfect, Vit A is really hard to find in ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect, Vit A is really hard to find in the drug stores so I order it on here, does the job and was easy to order
customer_reviews.author: hey_its_80

customer_reviews.title: makes super smooth like a mini
customer_reviews.text: break capsule and apply to face. makes super smooth like a mini facial
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always Trust Natures Way
customer_reviews.text: This is what it is. I always trust Natures Way!
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I need a larger dose
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I have a feeling that the supplement is not really doing anything for me, and this would be the case with this Vitamin A. I take one a day. I have not observed any improvement in any way, I had been taking it for a while now I received it on January 4th 2016. With some other supplements I know it is doing something 'good' I will be taking it because it helps me... not with this one. When I am done I will look for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: JPMS

customer_reviews.title: Take this every morning.
customer_reviews.text: Good vitamin. Goes down easy and it helps my skin. Will buy again for sure. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement & great seller!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to brand and go-to seller for Vitamin A, part of of daily supplement aresenal for health!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great source of vitamin A. So great, in fact, you should be careful of them.
customer_reviews.text: These did the job so well and so thoroughly that I developed the itchy hands and feet which are a symptom of A overdose. I'd recommend them, but I'd also recommend you keep an eye out for that little tidbit, particularly if you are also supplementing with a multi which contains A, which was my case.
customer_reviews.author: Ellell Bee

customer_reviews.title: Don't poison yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Did you know that you can overdose on Vitamin A? Neither did I until I took too many of these with in a weeks time and began vomiting non-stop for over 24 hours. Poison control was clueless on how to respond and told me to just wait it out loll. Next time I'll just stick to cod liver oil.
customer_reviews.author: ❤JesusLives❤

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Way Vitamin A, 100 Softgels
customer_reviews.text: Good quality / price relationship. I use for some time this branch and I`m satisfied. It`s a ligth flask and small size.
customer_reviews.author: Vepalm

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with this vitamin A
customer_reviews.text: I received this product for an honest opinion. I was happy to get the amount of vitamin A for my skin and health. I have keratosis and vitamin A shortage is one of the factors. These were small capsules and so easy to take, no after taste or side effects. The product came packaged nicely and I was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Midkiff

customer_reviews.title: Try it out. Great service.
customer_reviews.text: I was told this was good in order for the body to digest more vitamin C. Not sure how well it is working (along with the other stuff we use ie. colloidal silver) but my wife and I have been able to ward of some of the passing illnesses. It wouldnt hurt to try it. We still have some a few month later. Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin A gels
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Vit A that was easy to swallow and this one fit the bill to a T. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine F

customer_reviews.title: Clear Skin is Tops
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin A is the secret to my clear skin. I use it daily and Nature's way is a consistent company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: Small, easy to swallow, flexible capsule vitamin A. Great way to get the extra vitamins you need.
customer_reviews.author: Pillowtalk

customer_reviews.title: ... help keep my nails stronger and not break as easily.
customer_reviews.text: Really seems to help keep my nails stronger and not break as easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Vit A
customer_reviews.text: No nasty aftertaste and easy to swallow. I can not think of more words to use, so I am blathering
customer_reviews.author: Ady Balch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: One should take only 2 per week to avoid toxic effects.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna Tuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my dog and she really likes them. She thinks they are treats. I bought it on the vet's recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Lake lady

customer_reviews.title: probably not a good idea to be taking this much Vitamin A on a daily basis
customer_reviews.text: Like I said, probably not a good idea to be taking this much Vitamin A on a daily basis. I bought this with the brilliant idea of curing my adult acne. It didn't work. In fact, it made me sick after about 2 weeks of daily use. If you have acne, see a doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua Papa

product_meta.title: Nature's Way Vitamin A, 3,000 mcg per serving, 100 Softgels
product_meta.description: Vitamin A helps maintain cell membrane integrity, and also supports proper bone formation, reproductive function and vision.*
feature_bullets: Contains soy and fish (cod, saithe, haddock, and pollack)
